name: Proto 1
description:
In this game, enemies will shoot projectiles at you. However, these projectiles will bounce off of walls and can damage the enemies; use this to defeat enemies. Move your character with WASD, create barriers for projectiles to bounce off of with P, use a spin attack to reflect nearby projectiles (albeit with damage to your health), and restart the stage with R.

I wish to improve my game development skills, so please give feedback at https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScIc1liI2SwODGfEF5v9MVf0c52Jk55Gvjbi8GaAD8ZBuDldA/viewform?usp=sf\_link
